name: Owl Knight
description:
Explore, fight, and collect as you travel the land using your unique owl abilities to find someone who can tell you why the heck you woke up with knight's armor and a tiny pickaxe!

This game was developed as a capstone project for seven students from Full Sail University. Owl Knight is heavily based off of Yacht Club Games' 'Shovel Knight.' When creating this game, Team Night Owls, who became Night Owl Studios, was told to choose a reference game, in this case Shovel Knight, and create a clone that utilizes the base mechanics of the reference game. Owl Knight contains much of the same mechanics and even clones of the bosses.

Please enjoy Night Owl Studios' last project as game design students, and first game shipped to PC!
